A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I will start off with the good\, great affects some good battles. Now to the bad parts - Too much Slap stick that seem to have taken place\, the force now seems to be completely over powered in regards of \"WE CAN DO ANYTHING !!! as long as we are strong enough\" and lets not get started on the superman scene. \nAll in all good bits yes\, more bad bits though and the plot seemed kinda pointless. Would rather watch the prequels
